jcr:root.jcr:description: This community has got me thinking that I should give surfing a shot. When I was looking up some info about boards and apparel, I noticed that they make board wax. It looks like it’s similar to what I do to my skis, but I don’t get how wax would affect the board in water.
jcr:root.jcr:title: To wax or not to wax: this is my question
jcr:root.userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/536.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/19.0.1084.56 Safari/536.5

_x0038_lha-yeah_you_needtowa.jcr:description: Yeah, you need to wax your board. The first time I went out, I didn’t really take any advice or ask any questions. After fumbling around for a whole day, someone else in the water told me I need to wax my board. It’s like night and day.
_x0038_lha-yeah_you_needtowa.userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/536.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/19.0.1084.56 Safari/536.5

ofd8-take_it_frommeorj.jcr:description: Take it from me or just about anyone else who surfs that you ask…wax your board. However, you wax the TOP of your board. This prevents your feet from slipping.
ofd8-take_it_frommeorj.userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/536.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/19.0.1084.56 Safari/536.5
